Crimes.Crime_Name: Cruel and unusual treatment or punishment
Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Personalized risk of cruel and unusual treatment due to political activities
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Stay of removal, protection under IRPA s. 97
Crimes.Standard_of_Review: Reasonableness for factual issues, correctness for procedural fairness
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Personalized risk beyond generalized country conditions
Crimes.Institutional_Action: PRRA assessment followed by judicial review
Crimes.Exemptions_or_Defenses_Cited: Lack of credible link between individual circumstances and specific risks
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Anecdotal claims, lack of corroborative documentation
Crimes.Individual_Status_or_Claim: Applicant claiming protection based on political opinion
Crimes.Governing_Body: Immigration and Refugee Board, Federal Court
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Insufficient consideration of personal risk, procedural fairness
Crimes.Protected_Group: Individuals facing persecution for political opinion
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: Officer found state protection available or risk not established
Crimes.Credibility: Found lacking due to vagueness and lack of corroboration
Crimes.State_Protection_Adequacy: Assessed as sufficient or risk not proven
Crimes.Legal_Basis: IRPA provisions on danger to life, risk of torture, cruel treatment

Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Personalized risk of torture due to political activities
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Stay of removal, protection under IRPA s. 97
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Sufficient evidence of personal risk beyond generalized risk
Crimes.Institutional_Action: PRRA decision subject to judicial review
Crimes.Exemptions_or_Defenses_Cited: Generalized risk not equivalent to personal risk
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Self-reported threats, lack of documentary support
Crimes.Temporal_Context: Recent past, ongoing concerns upon return
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Sufficiency of evidence, reasonableness of conclusion
Crimes.Role_of_Person: Alleged member of banned political group
Crimes.Protection_Claim: Risk of torture under IRPA s. 97(1)(a)
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: No evidence state would fail to protect
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Membership in MQM-A, internal conflict with MQM-H
Crimes.Credibility: Assessed as low due to vagueness and lack of specifics
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Threats from rival faction, possible state neglect
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Foreign national at risk of refoulement
Crimes.Perpetrator_Entity: Rival political faction (MQM-H), possible state agents
Crimes.Legal_Basis: Prohibition of refoulement under international law and IRPA

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Personalized risk of death upon return
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to show personal risk
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Lack of detail on threats and role in MQM-A
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Need for evidence beyond generalized country risk
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Alleged failure to consider evidence, lack of hearing
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of death due to political involvement
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Alleged threats from MQM-H, MQM-A affiliation
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Officer ignored evidence, failed procedural fairness
Crimes.Defendant_Response: Generalized risk does not meet threshold
Crimes.Authority: Canada Border Services Agency, Immigration Division
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Not applicable – claim was for protection

Crimes.Crime_Name: Inadmissibility based on membership in an organization engaged in terrorism
Crimes.National_Security_Element: Membership in organization listed or suspected of terrorism
Crimes.National_Security_Danger: Potential threat due to association with MQM-A
Crimes.Threat_Assessment: Based on organizational links rather than personal conduct
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Affiliation with politically active, potentially violent group
Crimes.Nature_of_Acts: Alleged threats from rival faction, political violence context
Crimes.Individual_Behavior: No evidence of violent acts or extremist behavior
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Issue: Failure to prove active participation or dangerous role
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Questioned due to lack of specificity
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: IRPA s. 113(a) – Inadmissibility for membership in terrorist organization
Crimes.Governing_Provision: IRPA Part 1, Division 3 – Security and Criminality
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Objective evidence required to establish risk
Crimes.Outcome: Inadmissibility not based on terrorism but lack of protection need
Crimes.Review_Standard: Reasonableness for facts, correctness for law
Crimes.Reasoning_Deficiency: Claimed but not found by court
